text: Hello all, just made [this](<https://gitlab.com/ExpandingMan/Ueauty.jl>) little package to make nice unicode aliases a little more common, in my code at least.  Will register this weekend, suggestions welcome

elements.text: ) little package to make nice unicode aliases a little more common, in my code at least.  Will register this weekend, suggestions welcome

text:
```# select the best 

macro ueauty_types()
    esc(quote
        const ℤ = Integer
        const ℚ = Rational
        const 𝔽 = AbstractFloat
        const ℝ = Real
        const ℂ = Complex
        nothing
    end)
end

macro ueauty_operators()
    esc(quote
        const != = ≠
        const === = ≡
        const ≥ = >=
        const ∑ = sum
        const ∏ = prod
        const ⇒ = =>
        const ↦ = |->    # \mapsto
        const ↤ = <-|    # \mapsfrom
        const |=> = ⤇    # \Mapsto
        const <=| = ⤆    # \Mapsfrom
        const ▷ = |>
        nothing
    end)
end```

elements.text:
# select the best 

macro ueauty_types()
    esc(quote
        const ℤ = Integer
        const ℚ = Rational
        const 𝔽 = AbstractFloat
        const ℝ = Real
        const ℂ = Complex
        nothing
    end)
end

macro ueauty_operators()
    esc(quote
        const != = ≠
        const === = ≡
        const ≥ = >=
        const ∑ = sum
        const ∏ = prod
        const ⇒ = =>
        const ↦ = |->    # \mapsto
        const ↤ = <-|    # \mapsfrom
        const |=> = ⤇    # \Mapsto
        const <=| = ⤆    # \Mapsfrom
        const ▷ = |>
        nothing
    end)
end
